column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Nestled in the heart of Chicago
column2: this place keeps themselves very busy even on weeknights. We visited this place and had a 40 minute wait on a Tuesday night. However
column3: they let you place your pizza order right away because the pizza will take about 40 minutes to cook. Folks
column4: well worth the wait. The pizza was amazing. We had the standard pepperoni and sausage deep dish with butter crust. The sausage was like a layer of sausage
column5: like a pancake. Very flavorful through and through. We ordered some drinks to go with it. No I would not recommend them. They tasted fine
column6: but had no strength in them. But we did not come here for the drinks so I don't take anything away from them for that.
